wikipedia_page.main: Julian Hails (born 20 November 1967) is an English former professional footballer who played in the Football League as a midfielder for Fulham and Southend United. He is now a maths teacher at the Haberdashers' Aske's Boys' School.

response: * Julian Hails, former footballer, teaches mathematics
Dursun made his debut in the Division One for Southend United on 14 December 1996, away to Queens Park Rangers in the 4–0 defeat, replacing Julian Hails in the 53rd minute.
